abstract: The stock market may have gone too far, too fast. Gina Martin Adams, an equity strategist at Wells Fargo Securities, certainly thinks so. At some point, and probably fairly soon, she told The New York Times, a host of fundamental problems would pull stocks back down to earth.
snippet: The stock market may have gone too far, too fast. Gina Martin Adams, an equity strategist at Wells Fargo Securities, certainly thinks so. At some point, and probably fairly soon, she told The New York Times, a host of fundamental problems would pu...
lead_paragraph: The stock market has been soaring. It may have gone too far, too fast.

headline.main: Is the Recent Rally Irrational Exuberance?
